com.ulflander.mining
Class Patterns

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.mining.Patterns

public final class Patterns
extends Object

Contains some useful Regular Expression patterns and some handy lists of chars for various tasks.

Field Summary
static String ABSTRACT_TEXT_LOWERCASE
          String usable for a RegExp that cheks if there is at least one lowercase letter in a text, in any latin language.
static Pattern CHAPTER_TO_PARAGRAPH
          Pattern that split a text into paragraphs.
static Pattern IS_TEXT_UPPERCASE
          String usable for a RegExp that checks if there is only uppercase letters in a text, in any latin language.
static Pattern IS_URL
          Pattern that recognize an url.
static Pattern ONE_LETTER_WORDS
          Pattern to check and replace one letter words in a string.
static String TOKEN_CLEANER_ENDPOINTS
          Chars that can't be at he beginning or the end of a token.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_CAPITALIZED
          Pattern to check capitalization.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_DATE_YEAR_PREFIXED
          Pattern to recognize a year representation (mid-2013).
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_EMAIL
          Pattern to recognize an email address.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_HASHTAG
          Pattern to recognize a hashTag.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_HOUR
          Pattern to recognize an hour.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_IPADDRESS
          Pattern to recognize an IPV4 address.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_MONEY_AMOUNT
          Pattern to recognize a money amount.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_MONEY_CURRENCY_CHARS
          Pattern to recognize some currency chars.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_NUMBER
          Pattern to recognize a number.
static Pattern TOKEN_REC_TWITTER_USER
          Pattern to recognize a twitter username.
